activities:
Opower processes certain personal information to provide energy-related data presentment services to its energy utility clients,
including customer information provided by utility clients, their customers and third parties. Opower also processes personal information of individuals employed by Opower's European subsidiaries collected in the context of the employment
relationship as part of human resources administration.
eucountries: Czech Republic, France, Germany, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
recoursemech: For organization human resources data: EU data protection authorities (DPAs); For all other types of data: TRUSTe EU Safe Harbor Program
